Why Moolya? Why Partner With Us?

At Moolya Software Testing Private Limited, we lead globally in software testing and quality assurance, partnering with clients across industries to deliver top-tier solutions. Our services ranging from functional and automation to performance and security testing are designed to enhance software quality, efficiency, and productivity, ensuring client success and satisfaction.

Skin in the Game

We go beyond vendor roles, fostering deep co-ownership with customers.

Culture Focus

We help customers address issues by focusing on cultural fixes.

Leadership Friendly

Moolya empowers C-, V-, and D-level leaders with insights.

Scaling Value

Moolya unifies Tech, Test, Product, Customer & Business insights to scale value

What is it?

Fastrack Automation, an advanced solution from Moolya, employs intelligent techniques to expedite your automation process in the existing environment without any platform lock in half the time.

Fastrack Automation optimizes test case design, execution, and maintenance. The service dynamically adapts to changing application landscapes, ensuring sustained efficiency gains.

section: Fastrack Automation > Abstraction is our differentiator

text:
Fastrack Automation -Platforms & Tools supported for Web, Mobile and Desktop

Why Fastrack Automation

S:No

Aspect

Fastrack Automation

Regular Automation

01

Scripting

Fastrack Automation utilizes intelligent techniques such as Al and ML to automate test case creation, execution, and maintenance

Traditional test automation often involves manual scripting of test cases using programming languages or automation tools

02

Platform

Fastrack Automation is designed to be platform-agnostic, allowing testing across a wide range of technologies and environments without lock-in

Automation scripts may be specific to certain platforms or technologies, leading to platform lock-in

03

Maintenance

Fastrack Automation automates maintenance tasks, such as updating test scripts in response to changes in the application, reducing manual effort and improving reliability -Self Healing

Maintenance of automation scripts requires continuous effort, especially when dealing with changes in the application under test

04

Scalability

Fastrack Automation offers a scalable architecture that can handle large-scale test automation efforts with ease, enabling teams to efficiently test complex applications

Scaling automation efforts to handle large test suites or complex applications can be challenging and may require additional resources

05

Setup

Fastrack Automation provides a quick and easy setup process, allowing teams to start automating tests rapidly without extensive configuration

Setting up automation frameworks and environments can be time-consuming and requires technical expertise
heading_level_1: Fastrack Automation -Platforms & Tools supported for Web, Mobile and Desktop

text:
Moolya's Approach to Fastrack Automation

Q • Identify Test Scenarios

Creating Manual Test Cases

Using Scaffolding Framework

Create Automation Test Cases

Er Run Automation Append the script Regression

Moolya's Scaffolding Framework

Context Understanding

Understanding the requirements with Business impact, Technical implementation, Why implement it now , How are you managing now without this requirement, Existing automation approach, Current challenges in automation.

Strategising

Focus on user scenarios and functionality during testing. Manual testing of complex workflows is time-consuming. Build a scalable, maintainable automation framework to cut down manual effort, saving time and cost by choosing the right tools. 11

Influencing

Tag relevant stakeholders and provide test automation reports including the test coverage details

Performing

In test planning, we review smoke charters, create test cases, and script feasible ones for automation.

Fastrack Automation -Fitment

Greenfield Situation

• •
• New product implementation
• •
• Testing is predominantly manual
• •
• SAASification or going mobile

Brownfield Situation

• •
• Replace deprecated/slow tools (e.g., Protractor) with faster, scalable alternatives
• •
• Move from proprietary to open, cost­effective frameworks
• •
• Enhance existing frameworks to accelerate automation and reduce flakiness

Legacy Applications

• •
• Applications that have not had testability considerations .

Distributed Testing

• •
• Parallel Execution.
• •
• Coordinated Parallel Workflows.
• •
• Workflow cuts across Multiple Applications.
